sources.description:
They rigged the game‚Ä¶ but he‚Äôs rewriting the rules with fists and fury.
Former elite operative Mike Bishop (Mark Dacascos) just wants a quiet life ‚Äì until his ex-partner is taken out during a high-stakes security op. Framed and hunted by shadowy forces, he teams up with a tenacious Louise (Carrie-Anne Moss) to expose a conspiracy that reaches the highest levels of power. Expect wire-fu showdowns, ticking-clock suspense, and a trail of shattered glass across Los Angeles!
